title: Bronze/Silver Duo Que - Sup/JG/Mid Needed - I'm ADC

embed.description: Summoner Lookup with statistics, ratings, SkillScore and more for Lying In Ivy, a League of Legends summoner on the North America region.

body:
The title explains what I'm looking for. I'm hoping to seed at least Silver before Season 5. I'm averaging 15-18/20 wins with a partner lately.

I've linked my lolskill so you can see my capabilities. Please note that I was pretty noobish this Summer but I have greatly improved since. This being said, my stats will reflect an average of my previous and present capability.

Recent Stats:
Corki - 70% Win Rate, 4.64 KDA
Draven - 56.9% Win Rate, 3.19 KDA
Vayne - 3.27 KDA

Please comment with your summoner name or add me in game - Lying In Ivy

Thanks!
LIVi
